entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I've founded a C# code that crashes Visual Studio (and VS Code C# extension) #70027
  • Endless popup error messages #70025
  • Refactor -> Extract Method ignores namespace aliases #70024
  • Analyzer errors while working in Roslyn: VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer throws InvalidCastException #70015
  • Fast path check in TryCalculateRequiredMembers is overly broad #70013
  • Better support for looking up switch label symbols from `SemanticModel` #70012
  • Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source? #70011
  • Source generator started failing to load after VS update #70008
  • StackoverflowException when compiling VB.NET project #70007

Closed

  • Support go to definition (F12) for `goto` statements, navigating to the target label #69916
  • C# IDE0250 suggestion (make struct readonly) can cause CS8342 error (readonly struct can't contain field-like events) #69994
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70026
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Bump the NuGet.Frameworks version #70023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2271398 #70021
  • Optimize allocations in TextReader.ReadToEnd utilized by SourceText.From #70017
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow switch arms to start a line with an open brace #70014
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle property without accessors in `Binder.ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning` #70009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to work with interpolated strings. #70006
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for navigating to the definition of the target label of a `goto` #70020
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [Performance] Avoid 1GB of Enumerator boxing allocations #69972
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70022
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixup issue with incorrect solution handling in syncing tests. #70019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Exclude BCL binaries in Roslyn ServiceHub vsix #69239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #70018
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move methods to more appropriate file #69999
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Performance] Avoid 500MB of HashSet enumerator allocations calling `Any` #69973
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • [17.7] Cache substituted base type #69635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7
  • Do not offer 'make struct readonly' when events are present #69998
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce array allocations of BadArguments #69970
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Expose fix all for refactorings as an experimental public API #69430
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Support converting collection-initializers to collection-expressions in more cases. #69983
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
